title: Sleeping
content:
Sleeping Sleeping creatures can't move or act.Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws automatically fail.Attack Rolls from within 1.5 of sleeping creatures have Advantage, and any attack that hits the creature is a Critical Hit.Condition is removed by taking damage, receiving Help or being Shoved.
